title: Nautilus Reef January 2016 Update
body:
Hi Everyone!

With the new year comes the latest Nautilus Reef update. Head over to [this](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/nautilus-reef-january-2016-update) news post to read all about what we've been up to and see a few work in progress photos and design concepts.  

You can also check out the website linked from the news post where you can check to see if your name is going to be on the reef.

We're getting there! 

https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/oce/reef/model1.png&resize=640:480

replies.body:
So I earned like 40 something points during ocean week and my name is not on the list? Is there possibly a mistake or did some people just not get included?
Edit- Two of my mates (Doorzone and Flurochickn) also cannot find themselves.
Same here, damn I'm unhappy.

I'm another one and name is not offensive or what ever. I know I earned  well over what was required to get the name on the wall it's lame let us know how you go. 

You got names like 111, 120, 243, 322, 405, 911, 1006, 1135, 1790, 1883, 2796, 3989, 5811, 6300, 21225, 41211, 73514, 91210, 99887, 101020, 123270, 325987, 552200, 1818218, 2504545, 7897899, 13172327, 17195081, 22446345, 93097654, 106462910, 211581563, 396406626, 726511995, 935519875, 1073066999, 1215250101, 1231434356, 1261522035, 2836932401, 10110100101, 48360475043 on there and good on them if they are real summoner names and they did earn the required points I guess but in all seriousness why would you put these up and not ours!!!
Well - I certainly hope I can tag along with you guys also - I'm not on the list either.
Im going to send in a ticket as this isnt right, we deserved to be on that wall
I just hope its looked after and not vandalized ):
Should be safe under the ocean ;-)
some people are desperate
The areas we're looking at are all marine parks meaning they would be protected by legislation. Anyone looking to vandalise a marine park is taking a hell of a risk!
ohhh that's good to know :D
Is ocean week and participation only available to those on the OCE server?
Yep, it was an Oceanic only event.

Scrolling though the comments idk how so many names got missed of the list. Personally i played back to back games as a 5 man to earn the points but i cant find any of our names on the list. It isn't like it can be changed now its just confusing how riot missed so many names...
Name not on list, sad times ;(

I earned at least 12 points from memory and was excited to see the reef finally made, but then was disappointed when my name wasn't found on the list. Just wondering why I wasn't included on the list.

I'm a little confused, i remembered me and a friend participating all through ocean week until we both got more than 11 points (We even have the summoner icon to show for it) and yet still, i cannot find either of our names. So what happened? Did you have to cut names for space or did you add only the top contributors to the memorial?

NAICE!!! Nautilus is in place! Love it guys!

Now to organise a diving holiday to Brisbane...

UNDER THE SEA UNDER THE SEA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
{{champion:111}}
so awesome
q

You should get fishes in at that have similar colour schemes as some champions {{champion:267}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:101}}  for example, and then you could have a picture of the fish next to the champ its similar to. Just thinking about it gives me so many awesome ideas; I really like it riot. Well done

*Also, NZ or AU?*

Haha, that would be cool but we'll leave it to Mother Nature to decide :-) We want it to be completely natural.

No spoilers on the location just yet ;-)
I dont quite understand how you could put even 10,000 or so people on the memorial. Are they really small names, or is the memorial gigantic?
It wasn't super easy!! The names are small but legible. I think there are 127 plaques or something crazy.
Have you guys considered the size of name varies according to points contributed? like those who got more points have bigger names and those got minimum points would have the smallest legible size.
Feels better since we can't participate PBE ;) Thanks riot!

> [{quoted}](name=CptStupendous,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=foOXHQQs,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-13T05:52:13.495+0000)
>
> I agree! :-) Make sure you check out the full news post though, there's more photos and pictures

Yes everything looks great, from the photos to the extremely nice web design. The journal entries are also interesting to read. Hopefully if Riot does something like this again, Fizz will win <3
Looks awesome! :D
I agree! :-) Make sure you check out the full news post though, there's more photos and pictures
{{champion:266}}
when u got naut just for this event
